verses.english: When the victory of Allah has come and the conquest,
verses.hausa: Idan taimakon Allah ya zo da cin nasara.

verses.arabic: وَرَأَيْتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدْخُلُونَ فِى دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفْوَاجًا
verses.english: And you see the people entering into the religion of Allah in multitudes,
verses.hausa: Kuma ka ga mutane suna shiga addinin Allah, ƙungiya-ƙungiya.

verses.arabic: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسْتَغْفِرْهُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابًۢا
verses.english: Then exalt [Him] with praise of your Lord and ask forgiveness of Him. Indeed, He is ever Accepting of repentance.
verses.hausa: To, ka yi tasbihi game da gõde wa Ubangijinka, kuma ka nẽme Shi gafara, lalle Shi (Ubangijinka) Ya kasance Mai karɓar tũba ne.
